p: The average dissimilarity between Hangar Cove and South Cove was 53.7% (SIMPER). These differences were largely due to the dominance of the Molluscan bivalve family Montacutidae [represented by only one species, Altenaeum charcoti (previously Mysella charcoti)], which accounted for 13.2% of the total dissimilarity, the Cnidarian family Edwardsiidae (represented by only one genus Edwardsia) at 6.6% and the Polychaete family Cirratulidae at 5.2%.
